changeSet.author: Leandro Zoi
changeSet.id: JB-393 - Notification is not received when user having the balance below the threshold amount.

column.name: content
column.value:
Dear $userSalutation,

Your prepaid balance has moved below the Low Balance threshold of $thresholdAmt. Your balance is currently at $lowBalanceThreshold.

Therefore, you are kindly advised to make sufficient payment into your account as early as possible.

Thanks.

update.where:
content = 'Dear $userSalutation,

Your Pre-paid balance has reached below the threshold mark of $thresholdAmt. Your balance is currently at $dynamicBalance.

Therefore, you are kindly advised to make sufficient payment into your account as early as possible.

Thanks.'

changeSet.id: JB-617 Add default ITG starter template
changeSet.author: Pablo Galera
changeSet.sql: insert into invoice_template_version (id, template_id, created_datetime, version_number, template_json) values ( coalesce((select max(tv.id)+1 from invoice_template_version tv),1), (select max(t.id) from invoice_template t), now(), concat((select max(t.id) from invoice_template t),'.1'), '{ "sections": [ { "pageBreakBefore": false, "header": { "elements": [ { "roundCornerRadius": 10, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 36, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#92d050" }, "padding": 10, "expr": "Invoice", "borderColor": "#ffffff", "bgColor": "#FFFFFF", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Invoice", "left": 0, "top": 50, "width": 540, "height": 100, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "\"Date: \" + $P{billing_date} + \"\\n\" + \n \"Invoice: \" + $P{invoice_number}", "borderColor": "#ffffff", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Date and Invoice Number", "left": 10, "top": 110, "width": 200, "height": 100, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "imageUrl": "data:image/jpeg;base64,", "name": "Logo", "left": 300, "top": 30, "width": 440, "height": 200, "kind": "Image" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#3f3f3f" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Enterprise jBilling Software Ltd.\n343 Preston Street -Suite 330\nOttawa, Ontario, Canada\nK1S 1N4\n\nBilling@jBilling.com", "borderColor": "#3f3f3f", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "jB Addy and Email", "left": 10, "top": 150, "width": 200, "height": 150, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#3f3f3f" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "\n", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Client Addy", "left": 200, "top": 150, "width": 250, "height": 150, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#ffffff" }, "padding": 1, "expr": " Notes", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#92d050", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Order Notes", "left": 0, "top": 260, "width": 300, "height": 15, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 2, "expr": "", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Order Notes: (V)", "left": 0, "top": 275, "width": 300, "height": 25, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#ffffff" }, "padding": 1, "expr": " Payment Terms", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#92d050", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Terms", "left": 300, "top": 260, "width": 150, "height": 15, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 2, "expr": "\n$P{payment_terms} + \" days from Invoice Date \"", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Terms: (V)", "left": 300, "top": 275, "width": 150, "height": 25, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#ffffff" }, "padding": 1, "expr": "Due Date", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#92d050", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Due Date", "left": 450, "top": 260, "width": 145, "height": 15, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 2, "expr": "$P{invoice_dueDate}", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Due Date: (V)", "left": 450, "top": 275, "width": 145, "height": 25, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "SansSerif", "size": 16, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#A0A0A0", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": true, "name": "Spacer", "left": 0, "top": 300, "width": 600, "height": 5, "kind": "TextBox" } ] }, "footer": { "elements": [ { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#7f7f7f" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "________________________________________________________________________________________", "borderColor": "#7f7f7f", "bgColor": "#A0A0A0", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "End of Invoice Lines", "left": 0, "top": 0, "width": 580, "height": 2, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "SansSerif", "size": 16, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "", "borderColor": "#92d050", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": true, "name": "Outline box", "left": 350, "top": 5, "width": 250, "height": 80, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Sub-total", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Subtotal Header", "left": 360, "top": 10, "width": 70, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "$P{currency_symbol} + $P{sub_total}\n", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "RIGHT", "transparent": false, "name": "Sub-total (V)", "left": 460, "top": 10, "width": 100, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Taxes", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Taxes Header", "left": 360, "top": 30, "width": 50, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "$P{tax_price} ", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Tax percentage (V)", "left": 410, "top": 30, "width": 60, "height": 50, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "$P{currency_symbol} + $P{tax_amount}", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "RIGHT", "transparent": false, "name": "Taxes (V)", "left": 480, "top": 30, "width": 80, "height": 50, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Total", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Total Header", "left": 360, "top": 60, "width": 50, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "$P{currency_symbol} + $P{total}", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "RIGHT", "transparent": false, "name": "Total (V)", "left": 460, "top": 60, "width": 100, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 11, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#595959" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Please find payment instructions on the following page.", "borderColor": "#ffffff", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Instructions on Next Page", "left": 0, "top": 100, "width": 600, "height": 100, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 0, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 16, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#92d050" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Thank you for your business!", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Thank you", "left": 0, "top": 120, "width": 600, "height": 50, "kind": "TextBox" } ] }, "content": { "minimalTotal": -1.7976931348623157E308, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#3f3f3f" }, "headerFont": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#FFFFFF" }, "headerBgColor": "#92d050", "groupHeaderFont": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "groupBgColor": "#ffffff", "addGroupHeaderFont": { "face": "Serif", "size": 12, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "addGroupBgColor": "#FFFFFF", "recordSeparation": "None", "recordSeparationThickness": 1, "recordSeparationColor": "#7f7f7f", "columns": [ { "show": true, "title": "Qty", "field": { "name": "quantity", "description": "Quantity", "type": "Field", "valueClass": "java.math.BigDecimal", "processor": "com.sapienter.jbilling.server.invoiceTemplate.report.DefaultFieldProcessor" }, "width": 50, "formatter": "#0.00", "alignment": "CENTER" }, { "show": true, "title": "Description", "field": { "name": "description", "description": "Product Description", "type": "Field", "valueClass": "java.lang.String", "processor": "com.sapienter.jbilling.server.invoiceTemplate.report.DefaultFieldProcessor" }, "width": 395, "formatter": "PLAIN TEXT", "alignment": "LEFT" }, { "show": true, "title": "Price", "field": { "name": "price", "description": "Price", "type": "Field", "valueClass": "java.math.BigDecimal", "processor": "com.sapienter.jbilling.server.invoiceTemplate.report.DefaultFieldProcessor" }, "width": 90, "formatter": "$CS #0.00", "alignment": "LEFT" }, { "show": true, "title": "Total", "field": { "name": "total", "description": "Total", "type": "Field", "valueClass": "java.math.BigDecimal", "processor": "com.sapienter.jbilling.server.invoiceTemplate.report.DefaultFieldProcessor" }, "width": 100, "formatter": "$CS #0.00", "alignment": "RIGHT" } ], "name": "Body:Invoice Lines", "left": 0, "top": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0, "kind": "InvoiceLines" }, "columns": 1, "name": "main Section", "left": 0, "top": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0 }, { "pageBreakBefore": true, "header": { "elements": [ { "roundCornerRadius": 4, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 14, "bold": true, "italic": false, "color": "#ffffff" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "Payment Options", "borderColor": "#808080", "bgColor": "#92d050", "alignment": "CENTER", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Options Header", "left": 0, "top": 10, "width": 560, "height": 20, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 5, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "\n Payment Option 1 - By cheque (US and Canada only):\n\n Pay to the order of: Enterprise jBilling Software Ltd.\n\n Mail to (Canadian address and may require additional postage if mailed from the US):\n\n Enterprise jBilling Software Ltd.\n 343 Preston Street - Suite 330\n Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1S 1N4\n", "borderColor": "#92d050", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Terms: Option 1", "left": 20, "top": 40, "width": 530, "height": 135, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 5, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "\n Payment Option 2 - By Electronic Wire Transfer:\n\n \n Bank Name: \n Bank Address: \n Bank Code: \n Account Name: \n Account Number: \n BIC Address: ", "borderColor": "#92d050", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Terms: Option 2", "left": 20, "top": 190, "width": 530, "height": 140, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 5, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 0, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 6, "expr": "Royal Bank of Canada\n200 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada M5J 2J5\n003\nEnterprise jBilling Software Ltd.\n00002-4016309\nROYCCAT2", "borderColor": "#92d050", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Bank Info", "left": 170, "top": 230, "width": 300, "height": 95, "kind": "TextBox" }, { "roundCornerRadius": 5, "evaluationTime": "AUTO", "thickness": 1, "font": { "face": "Serif", "size": 10, "bold": false, "italic": false, "color": "#000000" }, "padding": 0, "expr": "\n Payment Option 3 - By Credit Card, eCheck or PayPal:\n\n Please use the following link: https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd\u003d_send-money\n\n Payable to: admin@jBilling.com", "borderColor": "#92d050", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "alignment": "LEFT", "transparent": false, "name": "Payment Terms: Option 3", "left": 20, "top": 345, "width": 530, "height": 90, "kind": "TextBox" } ] }, "footer": { "elements": [] }, "columns": 1, "name": "Payment Terms (Next Page)", "left": 0, "top": 0, "width": 0, "height": 0 } ], "name": "jB Template (No Variables) ", "format": "Letter", "marginLeft": 20, "marginRight": 20, "marginTop": 15, "marginBottom": 30, "pageHeader": { "elements": [] }, "pageFooter": { "elements": [] }, "landscape": false, "sqlFields": [] }')
